data.comment: The match has started.
Throw-in for Huesca in the half of Valladolid.
In the minute 1, Jorge Figueroa Vazquez signals a Huesca throw-in in Valladolid's half.
Goal kick for Valladolid at El Alcoraz.
Throw-in for Huesca at El Alcoraz.
In the minute 3, Jorge Figueroa Vazquez signals a free kick to Huesca in their own half.
Throw-in for Valladolid in their own half.
Huesca to take a throw-in in Valladolid territory.
In the minute 5, Free kick for Huesca in the half of Valladolid.
Huesca awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Valladolid in their own half.
In the minute 8, Huesca awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Jorge Figueroa Vazquez signals a free kick to Huesca.
Bruno Gonzalez (Valladolid) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 14, Ball safe as Valladolid is awarded a throw-in in their half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Huesca.
Free kick for Huesca in their own half.
In the minute 17, Jorge Figueroa Vazquez signals a free kick to Huesca just outside Valladolid's area.
Jorge Figueroa Vazquez signals a free kick to Valladolid in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 19, Can Valladolid capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In Huesca Valladolid drive forward through Sergi Guardiola. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Valladolid have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 21, Can Valladolid get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Huesca's half?
Free kick Huesca.
Throw-in Valladolid.
In the minute 23, Huesca have been awarded a corner by Jorge Figueroa Vazquez.
Huesca's Rafa Mir goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
Valladolid needs to be cautious. Huesca have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 24, Valladolid awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Huesca a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Valladolid drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 26, Valladolid pushes forward through Oscar Plano, whose finish on goal is saved.
Jorge Figueroa Vazquez awards the home team a throw-in.
Huesca's Rafa Mir has run offside.
In the minute 28, Free kick for Huesca in the half of Valladolid.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in Valladolid.
In the minute 32, Jorge Figueroa Vazquez signals a free kick to Huesca.
Huesca are coming forward and Javier Ontiveros gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Valladolid goal kick.
In the minute 33, Jorge Figueroa Vazquez signals a free kick to Valladolid in their own half.
In the minute 34, Corner awarded to Valladolid.
Bruno Gonzalez scores with a header and the away team now lead 0-1.
Great play from Oscar Plano to set up the goal.
Can Huesca capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Valladolid's half?
Jorge Figueroa Vazquez signals a throw-in for Huesca, close to Valladolid's area.
In the minute 37, Valladolid have a goal kick.
Huesca awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Jorge Figueroa Vazquez signals a Huesca throw-in in Valladolid's half.
In the minute 38, Free kick for Valladolid in their own half.
Jorge Figueroa Vazquez awards Huesca a goal kick.
Free kick Huesca.
In the minute 43, Rafa Mir (Huesca) strikes at El Alcoraz but his header is cleared.
Corner awarded to Huesca.
Huesca awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 44, In Huesca a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Throw-in for Valladolid in the half of Huesca.
Throw-in for Valladolid close to the penalty box.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over.
The second-half is now underway.
Sergi Guardiola of Valladolid gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 46, Huesca have a goal kick.
Free kick for Huesca in their own half.
Jorge Figueroa Vazquez awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 49, In Huesca a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Throw-in for Huesca at El Alcoraz.
The ref points to the spot, it's a penalty for Valladolid.
In the minute 51, Waldo Rubio nets and Valladolid extend their lead to 0-2. The goal came from the penalty spot.
Rafa Mir puts the ball in the net and reduces the deficit to 1-2.
Javier Ontiveros with an assist there.
In the minute 54, Throw-in high up the field for Valladolid in Huesca.
Jorge Figueroa Vazquez signals a free kick to Huesca in their own half.
Can Huesca capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Valladolid's half?
In the minute 55, Huesca drives forward and Pablo Maffeo gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Jorge Figueroa Vazquez signals a free kick to Huesca.
Sandro Ramirez is on a sub for Javier Ontiveros for Huesca.
In the minute 56, Sandro Ramirez grabs a goal to bring things level at 2-2 at El Alcoraz.
Ball safe as Huesca is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Huesca awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 58, Huesca to take a throw-in in Valladolid territory.
Valladolid awarded a free kick in their own half.
Valladolid have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 59, Jorge Figueroa Vazquez signals a free kick to Huesca in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Valladolid goal kick.
Valladolid are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
In the minute 61, Free kick for Huesca in their own half.
Free kick for Huesca in the half of Valladolid.
Jorge Figueroa Vazquez signals a free kick to Valladolid in their own half.
In the minute 63, Valladolid make their first substitution with Joaquin Fernandez replacing Fede San Emeterio.
The away team have replaced Ruben Alcaraz with Kike Perez. This is the second substitution made today by Sergio.
Free kick for Huesca in their own half.
In the minute 64, Throw-in for Valladolid in their own half.
Jorge Figueroa Vazquez awards Valladolid a goal kick.
Valladolid awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 67, Can Valladolid get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Huesca's half?
Goal kick for Huesca at El Alcoraz.
Huesca drive upfield and David Ferreiro gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Valladolid defender.
In the minute 70, Valladolid awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Huesca to take a throw-in in Valladolid territory.
Throw-in for Huesca in their own half.
In the minute 72, Valladolid awarded a free kick in their own half.
Pablo Maffeo (Huesca) has received a yellow card from Jorge Figueroa Vazquez.
Free kick for Valladolid in their own half.
In the minute 74, Sergio is making the team's third substitution at El Alcoraz with Marcos De Sousa replacing Sergi Guardiola.
Jorge Figueroa Vazquez signals a free kick to Huesca in their own half.
Shon Weissman is replacing Toni Villa for the away team.
In the minute 77, Throw-in for Valladolid in the half of Huesca.
The home team replace Luisinho with Javi Galan.
Michel (Huesca) is making a third substitution, with Sergio Gomez replacing Borja Garcia.
In the minute 78, Huesca have been awarded a corner by Jorge Figueroa Vazquez.
Can Huesca get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Valladolid's half?
Free kick Huesca.
In the minute 80, Huesca's Dimitrios Siovas attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Huesca.
Raul Garcia is replacing Waldo Rubio for the away team.
In the minute 82, In Huesca a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Jorge Figueroa Vazquez signals a Huesca throw-in in Valladolid's half.
Jorge Figueroa Vazquez signals a throw-in for Valladolid, close to Huesca's area.
In the minute 83, Goal kick for Valladolid at El Alcoraz.
Huesca are pushing forward but Jorge Pulido's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Valladolid goal kick.
In the minute 86, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Jorge Figueroa Vazquez awards the home team a throw-in.
Ball safe as Valladolid is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 88, Jorge Figueroa Vazquez signals a free kick to Huesca in their own half.
Joaquin Fernandez (Valladolid) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Huesca's Rafa Mir goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
Free kick for Huesca in their own half.
Jorge Figueroa Vazquez will wait an extra 3 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Valladolid's Marcos De Sousa misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Huesca.
Throw-in for Huesca at El Alcoraz.
Throw-in for Huesca in the half of Valladolid.
Throw-in Huesca.
The match is over. Final score 2-2.
